segment.source: description: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.
segment.target: description: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.

segment.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.
segment.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.

segment.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
segment.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

segment.target: title: Send email

segment.source: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.
segment.target: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.

segment.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.
segment.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.

segment.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
segment.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

segment.source: Launch the compose email dialog
segment.target: Launch the compose email dialog

segment.source: Create a new EmailMessage object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.
segment.target: Create a new EmailMessage object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.

segment.source: Call ShowComposeNewEmailAsync to show the dialog.
segment.target: Call ShowComposeNewEmailAsync to show the dialog.

segment.source: Summary and next steps
segment.target: Summary and next steps

segment.source: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose email dialog.
segment.target: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose email dialog.

segment.source: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an email message, see Select contacts.
segment.target: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an email message, see Select contacts.

segment.source: See PickSingleFileAsync to select a file to use as an email attachment.
segment.target: See PickSingleFileAsync to select a file to use as an email attachment.
